alert.note: Alert for Cherokee; Clay (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 03 at 4:22PM EST until March 03 at 4:45PM EST by NWS Knoxville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Morristown has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Cherokee County in southwestern North Carolina... Clay County in southwestern North Carolina... * Until 445 PM EST. * At 421 PM EST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Young Harris, or near Hayesville, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Hayesville, Nantahala Lake, Shooting Creek, Tusquitee and Brasstown. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 PM EST for southwestern North Carolina. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 800 PM EST for southwestern North Carolina. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
